meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #690.

div.div: Missing introductions and first 20 clues of the Jeopardy! Round.

td.p: Ted Cooperstein, a law clerk from Fort Smith, Arkansas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $10,801)

tr.td: CANADA
DRY
CHRISTMAS
SEALS
TV
"GUIDE"

Sharon

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Ted
Sharon
Den
ARACHNIDS
AWARDS
ANCIENT WORLDS
PALINDROMES
(Alex: Those are words that read the same forward and backward.)
PRESIDENTS
POTPOURRI

Barbra Streisand

Ted
')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Ted
Sharon
Den

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '
SharonWho is Robert E. Lee?
$1,999
DenWho is Robert E. Lee
$3,050
TedWho was Robert E. Lee?
$1,100
Robert E. Lee')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'When he left to fight Civil War, the U.S. took his family\'s land & established Arlington Nat\'l Cemetery on it')

tr.td: U.S. LANDMARKS
(Alex: Please be sure your response is phrased properly.)
When he left to fight Civil War, the U.S. took his family's land & established Arlington Nat'l Cemetery on it
Ted
Sharon
Den
2-day champion: $18,901
3rd place: Kraco cordless telephone & beeperless remote answering machine including phone
2nd place: Ortho Mattress Co. space-saving day bed featuring solid oak frame, 2 mattresses, pop-up unit, & 5-piece comforter set + Hitachi 19" color TV with infrared remote control
Ted
Sharon
Den

26 R
(including 1 DD),
4 W

7 R,
3 W

11 R
(including 1 DD),
3 W
